title: Spindle, 1100–1400
medium: Medium: wood shaft, ceramic whorl, paint
description: Spindle with slender wooden shaft tapered to ends. Both ends broken. Black pottery disk whorl in center with geometric design incised and painted in red and white. Traces of black, white and red painted rings on center of shaft.

tombstone.epitaph: Spindle, 1100–1400.Medium: wood shaft, ceramic whorl, paint. 1920-1-5.
